Description: Safety Manager - Red Sea ProjectOne of the leading business Groups in Saudi Arabia is looking for Safety Manager & Dy. Safety Manager for their upcoming Hotel Construction Project at Red Sea.Skills
Skills:
Engineering Degree or Diploma certified by a body of Internationally recognized safety professionals
NEBOSH certification - Level 6,
First Aid /CPR/AED certification, ISO 45001
Lead Auditor certificate
Minimum 10-15 years experience in Hotel Construction / Mega Malls / High rise building construction etc with Consultants / Contractors, of which at least 5 years at the Managerial level.
Candidates with ME experience would be preferred.
Fluent in the English language.
Develop and execute a robust safety strategy and program for the Red Sea Project, aligned with international best practices, local regulations, and project objectives.
Lead, mentor, and manage a team of safety professionals to ensure the effective implementation of safety policies and procedures.
Conduct thorough risk assessments and identify potential hazards across project sites, facilities, and operations.
Develop and deliver safety training programs to ensure all project personnel are well-informed and equipped to follow safety protocols.
Collaborate closely with project managers, contractors, and relevant stakeholders to integrate safety considerations into project planning and execution.
Monitor safety performance and compliance metrics, analyze data, and provide recommendations for continuous improvement.
Investigate incidents, accidents, and near misses, and develop corrective and preventive action plans to mitigate future risks.
Maintain a strong working knowledge of relevant safety regulations, codes, and industry standards, and ensure their application across the project.
